Summary: flying object descend into ocean off riis park beach
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around September 13th 1992
divs: Sighting Detailswhile working on a bridge in Brooklyn, myself and two others watched a flying object hover, manuever above and finally descend (not crash) into the ocean off Riis Park beach. Eventually we contacted Nypd, and coast guard, both of whom responded. I have a story around their search but there's no way I.m typing it. The ufo was in the story for only about 6-8 minutes, and was in fact just a flying blur, but it absolutely powered itself into the water. If your interested feel free to call or em. It's an interesting evnt, actually made the NY Post, although they do not mention a downed ufo. I could easily locate the other chaps if need be. Thank You.
